about_the_game: Purrfect Alchemy is a unique blend between tower defense and wave survival! You and up to three other wizard cats are tasked with defending your cauldron using a strategic mix of spells, walls, turrets, and more! Power through waves of enemies to escape the cavern to which you've been banished.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel 2Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT / AMD HD 6850 / Intel HD Graphics 4400 or above
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
